meanings.definition: A small Australian tree with edible red fruit.
meanings.sent1: The quandong tree in the park produces delicious red fruit.
meanings.sent2: I picked some quandongs from the tree for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels had a party in the quandong tree, feasting on the fruit.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a ripe quandong fruit.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the quandong fruit filled the air, enticing everyone nearby.

meanings.definition: The edible fruit of the quandong tree.
meanings.sent1: She made a tasty pie using fresh quandongs.
meanings.sent2: The market sells jars of delicious quandong jam.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a silly food fight with quandongs at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: His words were like sweet quandongs, satisfying to the soul.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the quandong fruit made it stand out among the other fruits.
